instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 Boots Up to Login Screen Then Shuts Off After 20 sec
threads.message:
Hello,

  This is the weirdest thing I have come across. Brought it back to life after water damage repair as well as putting on 2 donor SMC and I get full bootup to the customers login screen then after 10 to 20 seconds it just shuts down. I am unable to PRAM reset for whatever reason.

  Any thoughts?

threads.title: 820-00165 Boots Up to Login Screen Then Shuts Off After 20 sec
threads.message: Nevermind, BIOS was corrupted. Running like a champ
